message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 400k, it's a good start, but I want more
You started with a high offer, now it's my turn to push back!
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not backing down, meet me in the middle or we'll go further!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up my advantage
You're not giving up enough, I'm taking control of the negotiations!
I'll meet you halfway, but I think we can do better
